    • Method Detail

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set the user password
        Parameters:

      • doRequest

        public void doRequest(java.lang.String table,
             java.lang.String attr,
             java.lang.String value,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns)
        Display the result of a request. Like SQL Request: 
         SELECT [columns] FROM [table] WHERE [attr]=[value];
        if [attr] equals "*" return all values: 
         SELECT [columns] FROM [table];
        Parameters:
        table - String - The table name in database
        attr - String - Attribute filter to apply
        value - String - Attribute filter value to apply
        columns - List<String> - The list of columns to display from table

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Return true if the client's identifiants are corrects.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the client is connected, false otherwise
